Package com.berbils.game.Entities.ProjectileSpawners.ProjectileTypes

Class Explosion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.berbils.game.Entities.ProjectileSpawners.ProjectileTypes.Explosion
  • public class Explosion
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates explosion effects, applying a texture and applying knockback and damage to certain objects in range

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Explosion​(PlayScreen screen, float explosionDiam, java.lang.String textureFilePath, float knockBackPower, int explosionDamage)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void explode​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 explosionCenter)
      Creates an explosive effect originating from the explosion center by sending out a number of raycasts in a circle, each raycast that contacts a fire engine applies a linear impulse depdenent upon the knock back power and distance from explosion centre
      void update​(float deltaTime)
      Must be called when the world is updated and is there to check how long the explosion texture has been on screen for, removing it if it has been on for longer than the explosion time

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Explosion

        public Explosion​(PlayScreen screen,
                 float explosionDiam,
                 java.lang.String textureFilePath,
                 float knockBackPower,
                 int explosionDamage)

    • Method Detail

      • explode

        public void explode​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 explosionCenter)
        Creates an explosive effect originating from the explosion center by sending out a number of raycasts in a circle, each raycast that contacts a fire engine applies a linear impulse depdenent upon the knock back power and distance from explosion centre
        Parameters:
        explosionCenter - The centre of the explosion

      • update

        public void update​(float deltaTime)
        Must be called when the world is updated and is there to check how long the explosion texture has been on screen for, removing it if it has been on for longer than the explosion time
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time in seconds that have elapsed in world time (Excludes time taken to draw, render etc) since the last Gdx delta call.
